Text: Archibold research report Enronpst Louise Hope all is well As per my voicemail would you please consider partcipating in a minute conversation with Rai Archiboldn regarding his report on Transaction Management Infrastructure see attached questionaire If not yourself then perhaps someone on your team at EOL Give me a call with the appropriate name and number and Ill get Rai to arrange a time with that person Thanks Rick Walker Forwarded by Richard S WalkerCHASE on AM Sri N PMORGAN AM To Richard S HASE cc Subject Archibold research report Enron Rick Per your coversation with John Hall earlier we wanted to send you a questionairre that illustrates some of the topics Rai would like to cover with Enron if possible If there are any questions please feel free to call John or myself Thank you See attached file End User Questionnairedoc Sri Sri N Kosaraju JPMorgan HQ Wall Street th Floor New York NY End User Questionnairedoc
